item.title: A wild blog appears
item.author: blog@lordyod.com (Lord Yod)
item.description: Hi, I’m Yod. I’m starting this blog to share some thoughts on my interests. This will probably be limited mostly to gaming and tech since those are the things I generally feel the safest sharing with others, but who knows?
